title: How to take a great picture - Carolina Molinari

multiple-choice.question: What determines the right amount of light for the correct exposure in a camera?

options.label: D
options.text: A combination of aperture, shutter speed, and ISO sensitivity

options.label: B
options.text: The sharpness decreases very quickly from the focus point

options.label: D
options.text: The sharpness becomes more consistent throughout the photo

multiple-choice.question: What is the purpose of the shutter in a camera?

options.label: C
options.text: To act as a curtain that covers the sensor

options.label: B
options.text: It increases the noise in the image

options.label: C
options.text: It has no effect on the noise in the image

options.label: D
options.text: It only affects the aperture and shutter speed

multiple-choice.question: What is the function of the light meter in a camera?

options.label: D
options.text: To indicate if the correct amount of light is being used for a good exposure

options.label: C

options.text: Using shape-shifting technology to change the shape of a mobile device

options.label: B

title: The terrors of sleep paralysis - Ami Angelowicz

multiple-choice.question: What is the name of the medical condition where a person is awoken from sleep, unable to move, and often experiences hallucinations of an evil spirit or an out-of-body feeling?

options.label: B

options.label: C

options.label: B

options.label: C

options.label: D
options.text: A side effect of a medication

multiple-choice.question: How often do most people experience sleep paralysis?

options.text: Infrequently, perhaps only once in a lifetime

options.label: C

options.label: D

options.label: D
options.text: It has no spirals at all

title: Beatboxing 101 - BEAT NYC

multiple-choice.question: What is the "kick" sound in beatbox, and how is it made?

options.label: A
options.text: The kick sound is the hi-hat, made by combining "t" and "s" sounds.

options.label: B
options.text: The kick sound is the snare, made by combining "k" and "a" sounds.

options.label: C
options.text: The kick sound is the kick drum, made by combining "p" and "b" sounds.

options.label: D
options.text: The kick sound is the bass, made by combining "m" and "b" sounds.
